I found this error in my log.  It occurred yesterday, so I can't tell what manifest was being validated at the time of failure.  The error only occurred once:

Do you still have all of the projects that were in your workspace when this exception was thrown? If so, could you touch each of your build.properties files and have them rebuild one by one - and attach the culprit if it comes up again?

Thanks

I see the same problem.. in particular, I get index -2:

java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -2

the rest is the same as in bug description.
I tried going through build.properties and found that when I got to org.eclipse.help.base I get a slew of them in my log. I had been working on some bugs for a while and accumulated several MB of these errors in my logs, so I don't just get one. I will attach the build.properties.
